Races.Name: Human
Races.Description: Resourceful and adaptable, humans excel through their versatility and determination. They possess an uncanny knack for learning and survival.

Features.Name: Civil Militia
Features.Description: You have been trained in the use of pikes, spears, and halberds, and can wear light armor and wield shields.

Races.Name: Elf
Races.Description: With ethereal grace and ancient wisdom, elves are long-lived masters of magic and martial prowess. Their keen senses and fey ancestry make them formidable in any domain.

Features.Name: Fey Ancestry
Features.Description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

Features.Name: Keen Senses
Features.Description: Your sharp elven senses grant you proficiency in the Perception skill.

Features.Name: Elven Weapon Training
Features.Description: You have proficiency with longswords, shortswords, longbows, and shortbows.

Subraces.Name: High Elf
Subraces.Description: Inheritors of a magical tradition stretching back millennia, high elves command arcane power with natural ease.

Features.Name: Cantrip
Features.Description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list.

Subraces.Name: Wood Elf
Subraces.Description: Fleet of foot and stealthy, wood elves are at home in the untamed wilderness, moving through forests like ghosts.

Features.Name: Fleet of Foot
Features.Description: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

Features.Name: Mask of the Wild
Features.Description: You can attempt to hide even when only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena. You have proficiency in Stealth.

Races.Name: Drow
Races.Description: Raised in the lightless depths of the Underdark, drow possess superior darkvision and innate magical abilities. Their legacy is one of both cunning and shadow.

Features.Name: Fey Ancestry
Features.Description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

Features.Name: Drow Weapon Training
Features.Description: You have proficiency with rapiers, shortswords, and hand crossbows.

Subraces.Name: Lolth-Sworn Drow
Subraces.Description: Bound by tradition to the Spider Queen, Lolth-Sworn drow follow the ancient ways of their dark goddess.

Features.Name: Drow Magic
Features.Description: You know the Dancing Lights cantrip.

Features.Name: Drow Magic
Features.Description: You can cast Faerie Fire once per long rest.

Features.Name: Drow Magic
Features.Description: You can cast Darkness once per long rest.

Subraces.Name: Seldarine Drow
Subraces.Description: Rejecting the darkness of Lolth, Seldarine drow seek redemption and a return to the elven gods of light.

Features.Name: Drow Magic
Features.Description: You know the Dancing Lights cantrip.

Features.Name: Drow Magic
Features.Description: You can cast Faerie Fire once per long rest.

Features.Name: Drow Magic
Features.Description: You can cast Darkness once per long rest.

Races.Name: Half-Elf
Races.Description: Walking in two worlds but truly belonging to neither, half-elves combine human passion with elven refinement. Their versatility and charisma make them natural diplomats and adventurers.

Features.Name: Fey Ancestry
Features.Description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

Features.Name: Civil Militia
Features.Description: You have been trained in the use of pikes, spears, and halberds, and can wear light armor and wield shields.

Features.Name: Skill Versatility
Features.Description: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

Subraces.Name: High Half-Elf
Subraces.Description: Descended from high elves, you have inherited their magical aptitude.

Features.Name: Cantrip
Features.Description: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list.

Subraces.Name: Wood Half-Elf
Subraces.Description: Descended from wood elves, you have inherited their fleetness and stealth.

Features.Name: Fleet of Foot
Features.Description: Your base walking speed increases by 1.5 meters.

Features.Name: Mask of the Wild
Features.Description: You have proficiency in Stealth.

Subraces.Name: Drow Half-Elf
Subraces.Description: Descended from drow, you have inherited some of their magical abilities.

Features.Name: Drow Magic
Features.Description: You know the Dancing Lights cantrip.

Features.Name: Drow Magic
Features.Description: You can cast Faerie Fire once per long rest.

Races.Name: Half-Orc
Races.Description: Born of two worlds, half-orcs combine orcish strength and endurance with human adaptability. Their tenacity in battle is legendary.

Features.Name: Relentless Endurance
Features.Description: When you would be reduced to 0 hit points, you drop to 1 hit point instead. You can use this feature once per long rest.

Features.Name: Savage Attacks
Features.Description: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage.

Features.Name: Menacing
Features.Description: You have proficiency in the Intimidation skill.

Races.Name: Halfling
Races.Description: Lucky and brave, halflings are small folk with big hearts. Their natural nimbleness and cheerful resilience make them surprisingly formidable adventurers.

Features.Name: Lucky
Features.Description: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

Features.Name: Brave
Features.Description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Subraces.Name: Lightfoot Halfling
Subraces.Description: Naturally stealthy, lightfoot halflings can easily hide from notice, even using other people as cover.

Features.Name: Naturally Stealthy
Features.Description: You can attempt to hide even when obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you. You have proficiency in the Stealth skill.

Subraces.Name: Strongheart Halfling
Subraces.Description: Hardier than other halflings, stronghearts are resistant to poison and remarkably resilient.

Features.Name: Strongheart Resilience
Features.Description: You have resistance to poison damage and advantage on saving throws against poison.
